Text:
Another bad show done by BBC. Some Ramirez woman sporting her fat jean ass runs around selling Us the same old Shakespearean version of how robing and murdering in France was actually a good sport "cause They stood up to Them".
No understanding at all. You can as well read Henry about them lions and all.
All against the backdrop of Union Jacks. Insult to historians. Just a piece of misguided propaganda shallow and stupid.
